Name: Crescent Cauldron Cafe
About the game: Crescent Cauldron Café is a casual co-op management game where you play as two sisters running their family's café. Both sisters are witches of a different variety and use their abilities for different roles. Sage manages the storefront - Baking bread, preparing coffee, and mixing potions. Mercury isn't interested in any of that, but does want to fly around on her broom to deliver orders. Asymmetrical local co-op Fly around on a broom as Mercury. Finding faster routes means getting deliveries knocked out quicker Manage the storefront and oncoming customers as Sage, while prepping items for Mercury to deliver Purchase upgrades for each sister and the store An additional gamepad is required to play local co-op. Crescent Cauldron Café can also be played solo, which allows you to switch between sisters.
